channel.title: Legious | Birth of Legends
channel.description:
[center][img]http://www5.picturepush.com/photo/a/12569483/640/12569483.png[/img][/center] [b]Welcome to[i] Legious[/i], a project that will be based upon the 474 graphical era of RuneScape. There will be a lot of unique traits about this new world, while also preserving the core game that you once knew. This will be the birth of a new server and many legendary players.[/b]
[hr]
Almost every project has a development team, mainly because it inspires others to remain dedicated and also gives relief to fellow developers. This not only builds a strong friendship, but speeds up the development process of the server. Fortunately, Legious will also have a development team. If you aren't quite sure what Legious is all about, visit the development thread [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,631538.0.html]here[/url].
[u][b]Development Team:[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Server: Tutorial (Steve)[/li][/ul]
If you like where Legious is headed and you think you want to help speed up and even improve the development of Legious, feel free to reply with the following application format: [code] Profession: (server/client/web/graphics) Portfolio: (provide some of your past/current work) Reason: (tell me why you would like to be a part of this team) Personal: (tell me some things about yourself, such as your favorite hobbies, music, etc.) [/code]
You will receive a private message and your name will be added to the Development Team list if your application is accepted; however, do not hold any hard feelings if your application is denied. Your application can always be changed or modified and may even be accepted at a later point in time. If you have any questions about our development team, please post them below.

item.title: Legious | Birth of Legends
item.dc:creator: @Mistel Mistel
item.description:
@Mistel wrote:

Hello ,

My In-game Name is ‘Divine’.

I would like to join your development team.

[ul][li]I am a programmer and can help you develop the server to the highest of my abilities.[/li]
[li]I also have enough experience to claim my self to be known as a ‘white hat hacker’ which means i can fix exploits and any dangers which will be put against this server. We are known as the ‘good’ hackers who don’t harm any one or anything.[/li][/ul]

Profession: ([color=red]Server/client/In-game features[/color])
Personal: (MMA- Mixed martial arts)

Just one question ; Do you have a web-client up and running?

Add me on my Skype - Divine.Divine786
 So i can contact you alot easier and discuss things server related.

Thankyou for your time to read this and i hope together we will make this server big.

  • Divine

Read full topic

item.title: Legious | Birth of Legends
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[center][/center]
Welcome to Legious, a project that will be based upon the 474 graphical era of RuneScape. There will be a lot of unique traits about this new world, while also preserving the core game that you once knew. This will be the birth of a new server and many legendary players.

[hr]

Almost every project has a development team, mainly because it inspires others to remain dedicated and also gives relief to fellow developers. This not only builds a strong friendship, but speeds up the development process of the server. Fortunately, Legious will also have a development team. If you aren’t quite sure what Legious is all about, visit the development thread here.

Development Team:

[ul][li]Server: Tutorial (Steve)[/li][/ul]

If you like where Legious is headed and you think you want to help speed up and even improve the development of Legious, feel free to reply with the following application format:

Profession: (server/client/web/graphics)
Portfolio: (provide some of your past/current work)
Reason: (tell me why you would like to be a part of this team)
Personal: (tell me some things about yourself, such as your favorite hobbies, music, etc.)

You will receive a private message and your name will be added to the Development Team list if your application is accepted; however, do not hold any hard feelings if your application is denied. Your application can always be changed or modified and may even be accepted at a later point in time. If you have any questions about our development team, please post them below.

Read full topic
